blog.name: theclosetiswonderland
blog.title: I feel things when I'm with you

tags: honestly i could go on and on about this
summary: [SPOILER] Do Eve and Villanelle really care about each other? A dive into their reunion...
title: [SPOILER] Do Eve and Villanelle really care about each other? A dive into their reunion...
body:
I saw a lot of people here commenting on how tough they were acting around each other when they reunited. They were acting too normal, exactly how they were supposed to. But we know that there’s nothing normal about their relationship or their story, so we shouldn’t see things here just by how they look. 

A lot of their interactions in this episode reflects not only on how they feel about each other, but it has a lot to do with how others perceive their relationship and their actions. Niko telling Eve: “Oh, Eve, you are. You are so kind, you’re the best person I know. Always have been… it’s why I love you. Come back.” and Konstantin telling Villanelle: “You’re a mess. She’s making you weak. You know that.” 

Niko and Konstantin words have quite a weight on both Eve and Villanelle, because they know them better than anyone, so it’s easy for them to realize how much they’ve changed because of each other. But deep down Eve and Villanelle are willing to let what they feel for each other affect them, they like it. They won’t even bother to keep it hidden…



…except from each other. When they finally face each other again, they put their walls back up. Eve acts as the detective who wants to get her job done and Villanelle as the steady cold assassin she’s always been. These are the roles they’re supposed to play after all. But even though they try to keep that up, their feelings for each other manage to crack those walls a little bit when they’re together. 

We can see their true soft  selves here, when Eve says “I think about that all the time.”, it’s not only about the stab, it’s about their confessions, the vulnerable moments they shared, not only about what happened, but mostly about how much they think and care about each other. 

(I think about you all the time…)


And for a moment there Villanelle questions Eve’s feelings towards her, she’s not so sure anymore, Eve didn’t show up in Amsterdam, she didn’t do anything about the postcard, was she really thinking about her at all? (Really?)

Eve doesn’t need words to confirm that she didn’t stop thinking about her, her touch says it all, and Villanelle accepts that, so she lets her touch linger for a bit. No, she didn’t stop thinking about her. (Not for a moment.)

And now Eve wants to hear it from her, if Villanelle feels the same… (Do you?)

She does. She thinks about her, in fact Eve’s the only thing she cares about now, she’s her home. (I think about you too.)

We all know damn well how much they care about each other and we know it’s not only about desire, it’s about who they are inherently. Essentially? That’s what we see as love, displayed in the more twisted way possible, but still, it’s love. We can’t view them as common people with normal feelings, but it’s all there and at the end of the day, what they crave for is each other, to be together. But they know that by doing this, when their walls come crumbling down, they’ll destroy everything and everyone else around them, everything they thought they knew about who they are, and everyone who cares about them… 

Even though they’ll keep playing tough, it’s just a matter of time before they get what they really want from each other, before they give in to their true feelings…  

“I’m expensive.” (Our feelings may cost us everything…)  

“I know.” 

“Will you give me everything I want?” (Will you be mine?)

“Yes.”

Well… there’s no coming back. You’re mine. 

Gifs: @villanevess, @sailortwift, @captainsvalkyrie, @villinelle, @youlooklikearealbabetoday and @villanelleismyeviltwin

body:
If Villanelle ever got a phone she’d just send Eve oddly specific memes that match exactly what Eve is doing at the moment and if Eve asked her about it she’d just be like Eve I’m not allowed to have a phone but then five minutes later send her some thing like

Me: Sends Eve memes that Eve will know are from me

Eve: Are you texting me?

Me:

summary: Okay but one of the things I’m really loving about this show, especially this season, especially this latest episode, is how...
body:
Okay but one of the things I’m really loving about this show, especially this season, especially this latest episode, is how they’re handling Eve.

I mean it’s clear right from the start that there Eve is different from most people, I can name three in the first half of the first ep off the top of my head, and those are only the ones I can remember.

And what we’re seeing here, how Caroline seems to be slowly grooming Eve into an assassin, and I think she’s doing that because she can see that Eve is really a psychopath and that her whole normal life probably started out as an act to fit in but became so real to her over time that it became real.

And that’s what Caroline is doing here, trying to rip away that basically delusion of hers and show her who she really is.

Plus that fits with the title, cause in effect it is the slow killing of Eve, or at least this mask that had at some point become her life.

I mean it’s clear right from the start that there Eve is different from most people, I can name three in the first half of the first ep off the top of my head, and those are only the ones I can remember.

And what we’re seeing here, how Caroline seems to be slowly grooming Eve into an assassin, and I think she’s doing that because she can see that Eve is really a psychopath and that her whole normal life probably started out as an act to fit in but became so real to her over time that it became real.

And that’s what Caroline is doing here, trying to rip away that basically delusion of hers and show her who she really is.

Plus that fits with the title, cause in effect it is the slow killing of Eve, or at least this mask that had at some point become her life.

summary: RE 205:  Don’t know if it means anything, but V is wearing the same black outfit in one of the promo shots where E is holding...
body:
RE 205:

Don’t know if it means anything, but V is wearing the same black outfit in one of the promo shots where E is holding her in a kind of dipping dance pose…

blog.description: Izzy. 24. Musician. Part-time writer, full-time admirer of pretty ladies.

summary: okay so i did some research and villanelle and eve spent nearly three hours sitting next to each other in the back of a car???...
body:
okay so i did some research and

villanelle and eve spent nearly three hours sitting next to each other in the back of a car??? like did they make small talk? did they flirt? did they sit in silence for three whole hours? i need answers and i need them now
